name: Hunting Jewels Mania HD
description:
Hunting Jewels Mania HD!!!
Get your fingers ready for the ultimate jewel saga that will provide you with a completely new match 3 game experience! Insanely addictive gameplay, impressive visuals and sound effects, a perfect blend of easy and challenging levels with lots of missions and boosters make this gem swap game one of a kind.
FEATURES:
- Up to 310+ Levels
- Power ups
- Many powerful Gems
- Various obstacles which bring you even more fun
